description: Defines the IPCException class, a custom exception used within the com.icontrol.ipc.impl package to handle IPC-related errors.

classes.name: IPCException
classes.description: A custom exception class extending Java's Exception, used for handling IPC (Inter-Process Communication) errors.

methods.name: IPCException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that creates a new IPCException with a specified error message.

methods.name: IPCException(String message, Throwable cause)
methods.description: Constructor that creates a new IPCException with a specified message and cause.

methods.name: IPCException(Throwable cause)
methods.description: Constructor that creates a new IPCException with a cause.
